title: National debt of Ireland 2024
yAxis: National debt in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2024 to 2021.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2021 to 2020.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2020 to 2019.
gold: This statistic shows the national debt of Ireland from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 . In 2018 , the national debt of Ireland was around 226.92 billion U.S. dollars . For comparison , the Greek debt amounted to approximately 303 billion euros that same year .
